document.full_text: jimmy rollins, the phillies' shortstop, likes both the mavericks' jason kidd and the heat's lebron james. but that didn't keep him from having a favorite to win the n.b.a. title.
document.title: sports of the times: rollins, fearless forecaster, makes call on n.b.a. finals, too
lines_and_colors: jimmy rollins, the phillies' shortstop, likes both the mavericks' jason kidd and the heat's lebron james. but that didn't keep him from having a favorite to win the n.b.a. title.
